kpi.name: M1023C24

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR RT DCH STREAMING FOR HSDPA RETURN CHANNEL UL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU Streaming data for HSDPA UL return channel DCH. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals. If the UE is in softer handover, then the counters are updated for only one cell once per each BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR RT DCH STREAMING FOR HSDPA RETURN CHANNEL UL
